title: Preseason Takeaways & ATN Mailbag
itunes:title: Preseason Takeaways & ATN Mailbag
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Colleen Wolfe – break down the latest NFL news including Jimmy Garoppolo's  preseason debut and the Ameer Abdullah's breakout game. Then, heroes check in on RGIII and Johnny Manziel before ending the show with another edition of ATN Mailbag.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
